Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 67th/Rhodes
ShortDescription: EB 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via Rhodes, 68th, Cottage Grove, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/Rhodes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via Rhodes, 68th, Cottage Grove, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/Rhodes.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Kimball and Belmont
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Belmont due to fire department activity near Southport.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Belmont due to fire department activity near Southport.

As a result, trains are operating only between Clark/Lake and Belmont at this time. 

Shuttle buses requested between Kimball and Belmont to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
